title: THE 2015 SUMMER RECAP [VOCAL EDITION]
content:
1. Funkadelic – Ain’t That Funkin’ Kinda Hard On You (Louie Vega Dance Ritual Mix) 
2. Nine Lives – If U Need Me 
3. Hiatus Kaiyote – Breathing Underwater (DJ Spinna Galactic Soul Remix) 
4. Joe Buhdha Feat. Terri Walker – Feel Right (Reel People Vocal Mix) 
5. 3 Winans Brothers Feat. The Clark Sisters – Dance (Louie Vega Dance Ritual Mix) 
6. The Soul Club – Thinking (Soul Mix) 
7. Sandy Barber – I Think I’ll Do Some Stepping (On My Own) (Opolopo Rework) 
8. Portia Monique – Ain’t Scared Of You (Opolopo Remix) 
9. Sean McCabe Feat. Hannah Khemoh – Reach Out (Sean’s Paradise Edit) 
10. B.F.A.M. – No Sleep 
11. Rhemi Feat. Sabrina Chyld – Deeper 
12. Rhemi Feat. Hanlei – Diamond 
13. Bakermat – Teach Me (MK Remix) 
14. Louie Vega Starring Adeva – I Deserve To Breathe (Louie Vega Gene Perez Bass Mix) 
15. Daniel De Bourg – Waking Up With You (Terry Hunter’s 25th Anniversary Mix) 
16. Luyo & Federico D’Alessio Feat. Marc Evans – First Kiss (N’Dinga Gaba Diplomacy Soul Refix) 
17. Montana & Stewart & Nortier Feat. Stephanie Cooke – The World To Me (You Are) (Nikos Diamantopoulos Remix) 
18. Ralf GUM Feat. Hugh Masekela – In The City (Atjazz Astro Remix)
source: The Official Home of Joonya T
